reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Enhance the National HIV response with a focus on vulnerability in Colombia

description.narrative: Colombia - HIV - Empresa Nacional Promotora del Desarrollo Territorial - ENTerritorio. This program has the following goals: Expansion of the National Response to HIV with a vulnerability approach. The objectives of this program are: Strengthen the institutional capacities of the response agents, to contribute to the effective access of key populations to health promotion services, prevention of STIs and HIV and Comprehensive HIV / AIDS care, without stigma or discrimination in 6 departments and 7 cities. Expand actions of prevention, induction to diagnosis and accompaniment for access to prevention services and comprehensive quality care in most affected populations (MSM, MT and PID) in 4 prioritized cities
